thread.title: S.Korea defence firm LIG Nex1 says IPO to raise $447 mln
thread.title_full: S.Korea defence firm LIG Nex1 says IPO to raise $447 mln | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: S.Korea defence firm LIG Nex1 says IPO to raise $447 mln
text:
SEOUL, Sept 21 South Korean defence firm LIG Nex1 Co Ltd said on Monday its planned initial public offering will raise 524.4 billion won ($447.14 million), after it was priced at the top of an indicative range of 66,000 to 76,000 won per share.
The precision-guided weapons maker said in a statement it plans to list on the South Korean main board on Oct. 2 ($1 = 1,172.8000 won) (Reporting by Joyce Lee; Editing by Muralikumar Anantharaman)
